body.name: T-fal Signature Nonstick Fry Pan 10.5 Inch Oven Safe 350F Cookware, Pots and Pans, Dishwasher Safe Black
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Heat mastery system: T-fal heat mastery system is a three ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time…superior and longer-lasting non-stick coating, an anti-warping, even heat base and Patented Thermo-Spot technology.

Durable non-stick: scratch resistant and toxin free, hard Titanium reinforced non-stick interior stands up to frequent use and allows for cooking without frustrating, wasteful, stuck-on messes; supremely strong.
Thermo-spot indicator: The ring around the spot turns solid red to show when pans are properly preheated and ready for ingredients to be added—preheating is key to even cooking and sealing in flavor.
Comfortable handle: ergonomically designed heat-resistant handle provide a comfortable, secure grip; end holes for optional hanging.

Convenience & time-saving: the signature fry pans feature pouring edges for dripless serving and draining…measuring marks inside pots to save time and effortless A plastic fridge lid to make storing leftovers quick and convenient. *lid color may vary
body.description: Bring style and ease to any home kitchen with T-fal signature Non-stick cookware. Perfect for new and seasoned cooks alike, t-fal’s heat mastery titanium non-stick, Thermo-Spot heat indicator and even heat base ensure that the cookware heats up quickly and distributes heat evenly. Signature’s durable, toxin-free titanium reinforced non-stick interior keeps food sliding smoothly across the surface for easy turning or flipping, and its non-stick exterior means no more frustrating stuck-on messes when it's time to clean-up. Even more, user-friendly T-fal cookware provides fool proof preheating. Its Thermo-Spot heat indicator features a ring around the centre that turns solid Red to show when pans have reached a proper cooking temperature important step allows food to cook evenly and helps seal in the natural juices and flavour of food. For added convenience and time-saving, signature fry pans feature pouring edges for dripless serving and draining, measuring marks inside the pots to save time and effort and a fridge lid for one of the saucepans to make storing leftovers quick and convenient. Oven safe and dishwasher safe, T-fal signature offers a wide range of pots and pans to fry, Brown, sauté, steam, slow cook and more. From trademark favourites to adventurous new recipes, enjoy cooking at home with T-fal signature Non-stick cookware.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features and Benefits Durable Nonstick Interior Scratch resistant ProGlide nonstick interior stands up to frequent use Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Comfortable Handles Ergonomically designed heat-resistant handles provide a comfortable, secure grip and are oven safe up to 350°F Dishwasher Safe Easy to clean

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time. It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love. Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking. T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great pan
reviews.reviewText: Nonstick surface is durable. The heat distribution is even. It is easy to clean. The 10.5 inch size is great and very versatile. The tall sides are what makes this pan great, there is minimal splashing and it holds all ingredients in the pan. Does not come with a lid but I do not find that a necessity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Discovered how great these are!
reviews.reviewText: Recently bought a 9.5" and 11" and they worked so great I had to buy the 8" to match my set. These distribute heat perfectly, are more robust that other models of the same brand as you can see by the thick edge lip, are very light, food doesn't stick and are easy to clean. One thing I'll add is the listing here says Made in China but they're not, this particular model is made in Vietnam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pan for the money
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a T-Fal pan they we use daily and have had for years with this new one, and it seems even better than the old one. Sturdy, well made and the non-stick surface works great. highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as well as expected..
reviews.reviewText: Works ok, but as with most all "non-stick" frying pans eggs will stick unless you put a little cooking oil in pan first! ~Lightweight, amply spacious, easily cleaned, and appears to be durable...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: easy to clean and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean, heat distribution and durability
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean, heat distribution and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than I expected for the price
reviews.reviewText: This small non stick frying pan is surprisingly heavy and well made. Perfect for cooking one scrambled or fried egg or a pancake or sautéed mushrooms for one. Handle is very comfortable to hold and the pan cleans very easily. Excellent value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. It's my go-to pan. Prefect size to cook a meal. Durable and washes clean easily everytime.
Très bien fait et la hauteur juste Parfait.
Me gusto mucho viene grueso y resistente le cabe más que un satén convencional

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect size for two or three people.
reviews.reviewText: I like that the sides are tall so I can cook all kinds of foods.

Perfect size for a one person anything. Easy to clean and use. If you're not one for reading directions, place the pan on the stove and don't put anything into it until the red dot in the middle changes color. If you follow that, you're food won't stick.

Es perfecto, aunque es del tamaño de un huevero, este es más profundo, lo que facilita mezclar la comida que estás preparando, no se le pega nada y es bastante resistente, se siente más pesado que los del súper, lo recomiendo mucho.
